long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WebDraw is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to allow users to draw directly on any webpage. It provides a canvas overlay where you can freely sketch, highlight, or annotate content while browsing. The extension includes essential features like undo/redo, color selection, thickness adjustment, and the ability to clear the canvas. Users can easily toggle the drawing mode on or off with a single click. The extension automatically adjusts based on the chosen theme and ensures a seamless experience across different pages. Whether for quick annotations, doodling, or visual explanations, WebDraw is a versatile tool for enhancing your browsing experience.
